item.title: The Relationship Between Reasoning and Performance in Large Language Models -- o3 (mini) Thinks Harder, Not Longer
item.description: LLMs: 03-mini achieves superior accuracy without longer reasoning chains, suggesting ’thinking harder’ matters more than ’thinking longer'.
